scripts.start-sandbox: docker run --rm --name mavryk-sandbox -e flextesa_node_cors_origin='*' -e block_time=3 --detach -p 8732:20000 oxheadalpha/flextesa:20220510 jakartabox start && bash ./sandbox-init.sh
scripts.start-sandbox-m1: docker run --rm --platform=linux/arm64/v8 --name mavryk-sandbox -e block_time=3 --detach -p 8732:20000 oxheadalpha/flextesa:20220510 jakartabox start && bash ./sandbox-init.sh
scripts.pre-compile-all: rm -rf ./contracts/compiled && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -p contracts/main -o contracts/compiled
scripts.pre-compile-all-m1: rm -rf ./contracts/compiled && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -p contracts/main -o contracts/compiled -m true
scripts.compile-all-lambdas-1: yarn compile-governanceProxy-lambdas && yarn compile-governance-lambdas && yarn compile-governanceFinancial-lambdas && yarn compile-doorman-lambdas && yarn compile-delegation-lambdas && yarn compile-breakGlass-lambdas && yarn compile-council-lambdas && yarn compile-emergencyGovernance-lambdas
scripts.compile-all-lambdas-2: yarn compile-farm-lambdas && yarn compile-farmFactory-lambdas && yarn compile-vesting-lambdas && yarn compile-treasury-lambdas && yarn compile-treasuryFactory-lambdas && yarn compile-aggregator-lambdas
scripts.compile: yarn pre-compile-all && rm -rf ./build && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build && yarn compile-all-lambdas-1 && yarn compile-all-lambdas-2 && yarn compile-all-lambdas-3
scripts.compile-m1: yarn pre-compile-all-m1 && rm -rf ./build && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -m true && yarn compile-lambdas
scripts.compile-aggregator-contract: yarn pre-compile aggregator && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c aggregator && yarn compile-aggregator-lambdas
scripts.compile-aggregatorFactory-contract: yarn pre-compile aggregatorFactory && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c aggregatorFactory && yarn compile-aggregatorFactory-lambdas
scripts.compile-governanceProxy-contract: yarn pre-compile governanceProxy && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c governanceProxy && yarn compile-governanceProxy-lambdas
scripts.compile-governanceSatellite-contract: yarn pre-compile governanceSatellite && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c governanceSatellite && yarn compile-governanceSatellite-lambdas
scripts.compile-governanceFinancial-contract: yarn pre-compile governanceFinancial && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c governanceFinancial && yarn compile-governanceFinancial-lambdas
scripts.compile-governance-contract: yarn pre-compile governance && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c governance && yarn compile-governance-lambdas
scripts.compile-doorman-contract: yarn pre-compile doorman && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c doorman && yarn compile-doorman-lambdas
scripts.compile-delegation-contract: yarn pre-compile delegation && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c delegation && yarn compile-delegation-lambdas
scripts.compile-breakGlass-contract: yarn pre-compile breakGlass && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c breakGlass && yarn compile-breakGlass-lambdas
scripts.compile-council-contract: yarn pre-compile council && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c council && yarn compile-council-lambdas
scripts.compile-farm-contract: yarn pre-compile farm && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c farm && yarn compile-farm-lambdas
scripts.compile-farmFactory-contract: yarn pre-compile farmFactory && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c farmFactory && yarn compile-farmFactory-lambdas
scripts.compile-vesting-contract: yarn pre-compile vesting && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c vesting && yarn compile-vesting-lambdas
scripts.compile-treasury-contract: yarn pre-compile treasury && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c treasury && yarn compile-treasury-lambdas
scripts.compile-treasuryFactory-contract: yarn pre-compile treasuryFactory && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c treasuryFactory && yarn compile-treasuryFactory-lambdas
scripts.compile-emergencyGovernance-contract: yarn pre-compile emergencyGovernance && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c emergencyGovernance && yarn compile-emergencyGovernance-lambdas
scripts.compile-tokenSale-contract: yarn pre-compile tokenSale && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c tokenSale
scripts.compile-cfmm-contract: yarn pre-compile cfmm && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c cfmm
scripts.compile-tokenController-contract: yarn pre-compile tokenController && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c tokenController
scripts.compile-vault-contract: yarn pre-compile u_vault && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -c u_vault
scripts.test-full: yarn compile && yarn migrate && ts-mocha --paths test/*.spec.ts --bail --timeout 500000
scripts.test-full-m1: yarn compile-m1 && yarn migrate && ts-mocha --paths test/*.spec.ts --bail --timeout 500000
